body:
Day 25 - 589*
What the fuck was happening? At first they ere three Loli robots that, for some reason, can fuse together. Then appears a girl that is actually a robot and the girl from which the robot had the appearance, then a random robot appears fucks a guy after saving it. Then, the three Loli robots come back they hit the MC on the head with a ball and he becomes a sex machine. Then the MC almost dies to a landmine put there by the robot that fucked the guy a while back and then the three Loli robots fuse together and fuck him.
If felt like I was on crack the whole time.
4/10.
